meanings.definition: To display oneself ostentatiously in order to impress others.
meanings.sent1: She was peacocking by wearing a bright, sparkly dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys peacocking by showing off his expensive watch collection.
meanings.sent3: The peacocking peacock strutted around the farm, trying to catch the hens' attention.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity was peacocking on the red carpet, posing for the cameras.
meanings.sent5: The student was peacocking during the presentation, trying to stand out from the rest of the class.

meanings.definition: The act of showing off or drawing attention to oneself in a flamboyant manner.
meanings.sent1: Her peacocking at the party drew everyone's eyes towards her.
meanings.sent2: The peacocking at the fashion show was hard to miss.
meanings.sent3: The peacocking at the office meeting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His peacocking in the classroom was like a bright spotlight on him.
meanings.sent5: The peacocking at the concert made the performer unforgettable.
